Example: Investment horizon yields
Consider an eight-year, 8.5% bond priced at 89.52 to yield 10.5% to maturity. The
Macaulay duration of the bond is 6. We can calculate the horizon yield for horizons of
3 years, 6 years, and 8 years, assuming the YTM falls to 9.5% prior to the first coupon
date.
